name: Posthuman Companion
description:
The Posthuman Companion app is a digital character sheet manager to be used in conjunction with the Posthuman board game. It helps players to manage their characters easily, save their characters, and also to roll dice for their character or for their adversaries, thereby speeding up gameplay considerably.

N.B. This app is not a stand-alone game, and requires a copy of the board game Posthuman.
